Reviews.Title: Droid Does!
Reviews.Author: T.O,
Reviews.Content: This smartphone has endless features that my blackberry didn't have. My next phone will definitely be a Droid. The phone's ability to be updated and rooted allows owners to prolong the phones usefulness and keep it from being obsolete like most phones are within months of buying and definitely a year of being manufactured.

Reviews.Title: Sooo Annoying
Reviews.Author: Hmmmm
Reviews.Content: Omg I got this phone had a few more scrathes on it then I though it would have, which was fine but, the phone keeps dropping all my calls the buttons don't always work and when someone calls me the screen changes and it seems as if I had hit the mute button when I didn't then again the calla drop. Now I wasted money on a phone and I have to either buy a new phone or try and fix my broken one. I AM NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER :(

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: selene rangel
Reviews.Content: this seller was fast and the cell phone was in great condition! i liked it so much i bought another cell phone from this seller!!! definitely recommendable!

Reviews.Title: DROID
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: The Droid phone was in perfect condition it arrived on time for my trip!....It was well taken care of just like it said on the description...
